DOC.brief_title: Acceptability Feasibility Medical Abortion Using Mifepristone Buccal Misoprostol
DOC.detailed_description: The study recruit woman pregnancy 63 day gestation . Eligible woman take 200 mg mifepristone , follow 800 buccal misoprostol . They later underwent clinic follow-up determine medical abortion complete . The study assess acceptability feasibility regimen seek determine efficacy acceptability buccal administration misoprostol well acceptability side effect experience woman .
